title: All you have to do is dig
brief_description: Throughout the year “fossickers” fill the mining towns of Coober Pedy, Andamooka and Lightning Ridge in Central Australia, searching for opals to make their fortune. The professional miners with their bizarre mining machinery, the casual people and the “noodlers” - weekend searchers.
